TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartZoneDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner

remarks.format:
## Remarks WebPartZoneDesigner provides design-time rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controls. It includes support for editable designer regions, templates, and auto-formats to allow a page developer to easily alter the appearance of the control.
The public <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.AutoFormats%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collections provide quick formatting options for the page developer and can be safely overridden to change the default appearance of a custom control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the **Auto Format** dialog box for the associated control at design time.
Docs.value: A pre-specified with a default WebPartZone scheme.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The AutoFormats property overrides its base implementation to return a collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.returns: A method call to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> with a null argument as the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The TemplateGroups property overrides its base implementation to returns a collection that is specific to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> class.
